Package org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins

Interface JacocoCoverageReport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Named, ReportSpec
    @Incubating
public interface JacocoCoverageReport
extends ReportSpec
    A container for the inputs of an aggregated JaCoCo code coverage report.
